thread.section_title: Biblio.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Biblio.com | www.biblio.com | 3 of 116
thread.title: Taryn Kelley

author: Taryn Kelley
title: Taryn Kelley
text: When I do business over the internet, my first thought is am I dealing with a trustworthy company? Can I give my payment information to this company and not have to worry about it? My second thought is will I receive the product for which I am paying and will it be of the quality described? With Biblio.com my questions and concerns were all answered in the positive. It's wonderful to know there is a company that can replace books that I love that have become lost over the years and I feared I would never possess again. Thank you so very much.
